name: The Journey To Steel Mountain
description:
"Some say, far beyond the sea of death, exists a place filled with ancient treasure, the Steel Mountain" - Unknown

The Journey to Steel Mountain is a post-apocalyptic steampunk, gun-crafting RPG where you make your way across a procedurally generated wasteland.

The Steel Mountain:

You're a mad scientist, quite literally, plagued by dreams of making a fortune off of the forsaken wastelands. All you have is your airship and your gun crafting station. This and your wits will be combined with the tools you need to defeat your enemies, develop better weaponry, and find your way to the Steel Mountain.

Your Gun:

Your pride and joy, combined from three separate elements, you craft your gun with the stock, receiver, and barrel. This changes your bullet type, fire rate, among other things that make for 500+ different combinations of weaponry. Which will you see to be your ideal weapon?

Procedurally Generated Levels:

Whether it be the dungeons below the surface or the wasteland above, fly from location to location in various procedural generated venues. Fight enemies, meet NPCs and even go shopping! Collect loot from the various chests to use in your crafting recipes!

Your Airship:

Your humble abode, and the place you visit in between visits, you can store stuff, and craft your gun!
